full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: Furniture for the Deputy Minister's Office

## Title
Furniture for the Deputy Minister's Office

## Reference Number
CB-335-39082042

## Solicitation Number
1000032676

## Tender Status
Expired

## Description
Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) for the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture for the Deputy Minister's Office located at 284 Wellington Street, 4th Floor, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0H8.

## Requirement Summary
The Department of Justice Canada has a requirement for furniture under the following categories:

* Accommodation furniture
* Furniture
* Office furniture
* Modular furniture connectors

## Procurement Method
Competitive - Selective tendering

## Evaluation Criteria
Price - Lowest Price

## Amendments
Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) Release 003 has been made available.

## Anticipated Contract Dates

| Field         | Anticipated Date |
|---------------|------------------|
| Contract Start| November 2, 2023|
| Contract End  | March 29, 2024   |

## Contact Information

* Contact Name: Shaun Revill
* Email: [shaun.revill@justice.gc.ca](mailto:shaun.revill@justice.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 597-4079

## Trades and Agreements
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)

## Relevant Documents
[Question and Answer documents and the Standard bid forms for English and French](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22374/questions-answers---amendment-003.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22374/questions-answers.pdf,https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22374/1000032676---rfb-standard---english.pdf)

## Notes
This procurement is set aside under the federal government’s Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Businesses (PSIB) and is excluded from international trade agreements under the provision for set-asides for small and minority businesses.  NOTE: CFTA does not apply to this procurement.  

---

This rewritten tender announcement focuses on the essential information required for potential bidders. It provides the title, reference number, solicitation number, and tender status. The description summarizes the procurement requirement
